text: 5.32: Mt 19.9 naŋga, Mk 10.11-12 naŋga, Lu 16.18 naŋga, Ro 7.3 naŋga, 1 Ko 7.10-11Hara yi narɨŋ ambin, kru mumɨŋga, nɨmburiŋ saŋɨnaŋga pɨŋguvarɨmandɨ. Kru mamɨŋavɨŋgɨrɨndi. Kamati uta kru mumɨŋgaŋ yawɨrɨmandɨ. Kandɨhamata vana andɨta, Gotɨndu tamɨŋgañɨ navundi kru mɨŋavɨŋgɨrɨvɨŋgɨrɨ ŋambɨ andɨndi maña andɨrɨmandɨ. Kamati kru uta yawɨrɨmandɨ hama ndahara Gotɨndu tamɨŋgañɨ, kru navundiŋ mɨŋavɨŋgɨrɨvɨŋgɨrɨ mɨŋga andɨndi maña andɨrɨmandɨ, vami.
